benchmark_details.name: API-B LEND
benchmark_details.overview: API-B LEND is a large corpora for training and systematic testing of tool-augmented LLMs, curated from real-world datasets focusing on tasks such as API detection, slot filling, and sequencing.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a diverse dataset for training and evaluating tool-augmented Language Learning Models (LLMs).
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: API-B LEND does not address environment interactions for an API agent and is currently focused on English API commands.

data.source: Curated from five human-annotated datasets and LLM-assisted generation.
data.annotation: Hybrid approach including human annotation and LLM-assisted generation.

methodology.calculation: F1 scores are calculated by comparing the predicted APIs with the gold ones and the predicted parameters of each API with its gold counterparts.
methodology.interpretation: High F1 scores indicate better performance in detecting and parameterizing API calls.
methodology.baseline_results: Models fine-tuned with API-B LEND dataset achieve better generalization performance compared to other tool-augmented LLMs.
methodology.validation: Experiments include both in-distribution and out-of-distribution evaluations.
